format: This data frame contains the following columns:
title: Agricultural Production in Mazulu Village
description:
Description
The Sahlins data frame has 20 rows and 2 columns.
The observations are households in a Central African village.
reference:
Sahlins, M. (1972)
Stone Age Economics. 
Aldine
[Table 3.1].

parameters.consumers: Consumers/Gardener, ratio of consumers to productive individuals.
parameters.acres: Acres/Gardener, amount of land cultivated per gardener.
